attributes.action: Remove self-isolation for arrivals from all over the world
attributes.additional_details: Boris' father and other rich people haven't been doing it so why should the average Joe do it? Moreover there are people who are doing transfers  at "safe" countries and others who should be isolating are literally just installing the app and leaving the phone at home so they don't get tracked. There is no actual proof self-isolation works and they rely on information from months ago. For the self-employed having to self isolate means not working aka no money.
attributes.background: The Tory government has miserably failed to deal with the pandemic and want to cover up, distract and fear monger us in order to avoid being in trouble with the general public by continuously creating vague and unnecessary rules. This has to stop!
